ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, funny how your reasons are so similar to my own. I played a wizard starting in beta 1 and got him to lvl 25 before phase 3 started... i quit soon as it
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, funny how your reasons are so similar to my own. I played a wizard
starting in beta 1 and got him to lvl 25 before phase 3 started... i quit
soon as it did. Mostly because clarity wasnt in the game yet (though
enchanters where awesomely powerful thx thx whirl till you hurl) and then
they nerfed rain spells. One of our favorite things to do was have two tanks
run around lower runneye and make a massive train while me and another
wizard friend would cast rain spells from far, far away. Worked awesome,
well, except the tanks tended to die if they got a bit too eager pulling :)

Then somebody posted about us doing that on the dev board and walla... rain
spells where useless. So i quit till final in disgust, figuring they wouldnt
need me to help betatest with phase 3 starting. When final did roll out I
picked the one class that could speed up med times, and never regreted it. I
am probably the only bard out there that doesnt feel insulted when people
beg for the mana song :)

Gendal Concorden, virtuoso of Tunare
http://www.norrath.org

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 12:48 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


> i was a wizard in beta3. got to level 18, then they changed the way AC
> works and i died too much. i finally broke down and started letting my
wife
> play. a friend of ours told us how the level 7 and level 10 songs stacked
> (when they did back then) and how sweet it was LOL. even though they
fixed
> that long ago, that is how it got started. i quit the wizard and started
> playing my wife's bard, and that continued in final til she started her
own
> cleric. i wanted to stay a bard because of being a casting class with
plate
> armor *grin* and also wood elves are just hot.
>
> Shada, 58 Bard
> Afterlife
>
> > I've always wondered why other Bards started playing the
> > Bardic class.
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
